title: Weekly Utah Meetup
locations: Riftgate Games, 5412 S 900 E, Murray, UT 84117
Hearthside Games, 6802 S Redwood Road, West Jordan, UT
Hearthside Games, 6802 S Redwood Road, West Jordan, UT
details: Enjoy our weekly meetup at a soon-to-open card shop, Hearthside Games, in West Jordan. Anybody is welcome to attend. Come learn Netrunner from the best players in the valley.
Weekly meetup on Nov 19 will be at Hearthside Games, West Jordan instead of the usual Riftgate Games in Murray, Utah. All are welcome to come learn and play Netrunner! We'll start around 6 each week.
